text: The clans of the Kohathites obtained cities by lot from the tribe of Ephraim.
For many days he besieged the sanctuary, setting up platforms and siege engines, fire-throwers, catapults and mechanical bows for shooting arrows and projectiles.
Is it not obvious that they are not gods?
He got into the boat with them and the wind died down. They were [completely] astounded.
I am the living bread that came down from heaven; whoever eats this bread will live forever; and the bread that I will give is my flesh for the life of the world.‚Äù
